name: vue-transition-a11y
description: Vue transition component with a11y considerations

scripts.doc:html: typedoc src/ --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/__mocks__/*.* --target ES6 --mode file --out docs --tsconfig tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.doc:json: typedoc src/ --exclude **/*.spec.ts --exclude **/__mocks__/*.* --target ES6 --mode file --json docs/typedoc.json --tsconfig tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.reset: git clean -dfx && git reset --hard && npm ci
scripts.release: run-s clean build test doc:html semantic-release doc:publish
scripts.prepublishOnly: run-s clean build test doc:html publish:changelog

scripts-info.info: Display information about the package scripts
scripts-info.fix: Try to automatically fix any linting problems
scripts-info.test: Lint and unit test the project
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save, then rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.doc: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.doc:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.release: One-step: clean, build, test, publish docs, and release a new version
